column2: Ugh, forget it! Have it your way.[~]I’ll build you your stupid ice bridge. Happy?
Huh? Oh, thank you so much!
Now the trip to Saronia[~]won’t take nearly as much time.
It sure won’t! ...[f2]Wait![/f][~]This is exactly the kind of shortcut to bankruptcy that I was trying to avoid!
No... I must...[~]I must destroy the bridge...!
Uh... Relax, Sherlotta! It’ll be okay!
